data.title: ld-exosim: Simulate biases using different limb darkening laws
data.name: ld-exosim
data.description: Code to simulate biases introduced by using different limb-darkening laws as explained in Espinoza & Jord√°n (2016)

evidence: "This repository stores codes to (1) select the optimal ... limb-darkening law for a given transiting exoplanet lightcurve and (2) calculate the limb-darkening induced biases on various exoplanet parameters."

"You are looking for the `which_law_should_i_use.py` code. Simply modify the parameters inside the code and let the simulations run. At the end, the code will print out the Bias/Precision values for each law..."

"Then you want to use the `run_ld_exosim.py` code. In the code just define the parameters you woud like to explore and run it. The results will be saved in a folder named "results" for your simulation..."
